content.en: Piezoactuator optimization: Researchers have been exploring ways to improve the performance and accuracy of piezoelectric actuators, which are commonly used in various applications. They have found that algorithms play a crucial role in achieving these improvements. By using adaptive inverse control approaches, H-infinite tracking controllers, iterative learning control, and other techniques, algorithms can effectively enhance the tracking control, open-loop control, position control, precision tracking, motion accuracy, and hysteresis compensation of piezoelectric actuators. These findings contribute to the development of high-performance and high-precision control systems for these actuators.
content.da: Piezoaktuatoroptimering: Forskere har undersøgt måder at forbedre ydeevnen og nøjagtigheden af piezoelektriske aktuatorer, som anvendes i forskellige applikationer. De har fundet ud af, at algoritmer spiller en afgørende rolle i at opnå disse forbedringer. Ved at bruge adaptive inverse kontrolmetoder, H-infinite tracking controllers, iterativ læringskontrol og andre teknikker kan algoritmer effektivt forbedre tracking kontrol, åben-loop kontrol, positionskontrol, præcisionstracking, bevægelsesnøjagtighed og hysterese-kompensation af piezoelektriske aktuatorer. Disse fund bidrager til udviklingen af højtydende og højpræcisions kontrolsystemer for disse aktuatorer.
